database.label: Factory Reset
database.helpText: ⚠️ This will completely reset the POS to factory settings. All local data will be deleted and you'll need to enter the connection string again.
database.confirmClear:
⚠️ FACTORY RESET WARNING ⚠️

This will completely reset the POS terminal to factory settings:

• All local orders will be deleted
• All settings will be cleared
• Terminal configuration will be removed
• You will need to enter the connection string again

Are you sure you want to continue?
database.confirmFactoryReset:
⚠️ FINAL CONFIRMATION ⚠️

This is your last chance to cancel.

All data will be permanently deleted and the app will restart.

Click OK to proceed with factory reset.
database.cleared: Successfully cleared {{count}} orders from local database
database.resetSuccess: Factory reset complete. App will restart...
